data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Distrito Capital, Venezuela.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Distrito Capital, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 2,097,400 souls in Distrito Capital and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Distrito Capital, Venezuela.
data.prayer: Lord, make yourself real to these new families.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Distrito Capital, Venezuela.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 255,010 believers in Distrito Capital to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, make bold the prophets in Distrito Capital, Venezuela so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Distrito Capital, Venezuela the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Distrito Capital an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.
